amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight by $4.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the amount made available for the Federal Housing Enterprise Financial Safety Soundness Act by $4.77 million to $26.77 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 211 (Roll no. 300).
